algorithm.maze

类 Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.maze.Maze
  • 直接已知子类:
    ShortestPathLearning, SimpleQLearning 

    public abstract class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    The learning algorithm for maze.
    Project: Reinforce learning.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/MFAdaBoosting.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.
    Date Created: August 16, 2020.
    Last modified: August 16, 2020.

      • maze

        int[][] maze
        The maze.

      • finalStates

        int[] finalStates
        The set of final states.

      • rewardMatrix

        int[][] rewardMatrix
        The reward matrix.

      • qualityMatrix

        double[][] qualityMatrix
        The quality matrix.

      • transitionMatrix

        int[][] transitionMatrix
        The transition matrix. The directions are: up, down, left, right, no move, respectively. It is determined by the size of the maze.

      • validActions

        int[][] validActions
        The valid actions for each state. It is determined by the size of the maze.

      • averageReward

        double averageReward
        Average reward of the learner.

      • currentRoute

        int[] currentRoute
        The current route.

      • currentRouteReward

        int currentRouteReward
        The reward of the current route.

      • findBestRoute

        public java.lang.String findBestRoute(int paraStartState)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Find the best route according to the quality matrix.
        参数:
        paraStartState - The starting state.
        返回:
        The route information.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if the given state is a trap state.
